parameters.name: typeArg
parameters.description: Is a DOMString representing the name of the event.

members.name: InputEvent.data
members.description: Returns a DOMString with the inserted characters. This may be empty string if the change doesn't cause inserting text, e.g., deleting characters.

members.name: InputEvent.isComposing
members.description: Returns a Boolean value indicating if the event is fired after compositionstart and before compositionend.
